name: 林文印
objective: In this course we will discuss different aspects of environmental science. The main characteristics of environmental problems will be introduced. Since sustainable development has been the optimal goal of many countries, the details and questions of sustainable development are important to realize. Energy is one of the main issues of human being in the 21th century. When environmental planning and management are conducted, energy effect should be included. Green community is regarding the living quality of people’s daily life, to learn the core concept and steps of green community is also necessary.
schedule:
1　　Introduction
2　　Characteristics of Environmental Problems
3　　Sustainable Development
4　　Energy and Environment
5　　Green Community
6　　Oral Presentations
scorePolicy:
1.　　Class Participation        20%
2.　　Homework　　                  40%
3.　　Term Paper & Presentation　　40%
materials:
1. Resource and Environmental Management, Bruce Mitchell, Addison Wesley Longman, 1997
2. Environmental Planning and Management, Christian N. Madu, Imperial College Press, 2007
3. Environmental Economics and Management, S.J. Callan and J.M. Thomas, IRWIN, 1996

name: 胡憲倫
objective: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
schedule:
a.1   b.永續發展管理導論－兼談新經濟與綠色資本主義(第一、六、八、十三章)
a.2   b.創新與提昇資源生產力(第二、三、四章)
a.3   b.生物模擬－模擬自然(第九、十、十一章)
a.4   b.服務與流通(第七、十四章)
a.5   b.對綠色資本的投資(第五、第十二章)
a.6   b.結語(第十五章)&考試
scorePolicy:
作業：60%
期中考試：30 % 
出席情況：
學期考試：40 % 
其他：專題討論(書面及口頭)
materials:
教科書
1.吳信如譯，保羅霍肯等原著，綠色資本主義，天下文化，2002

參考書目
1.其他指定之中英文期刊文獻及報告
